summary: AN ORDINANCE implementing the settlement in Scannell v. The City of Seattle, amending the Seattle Municipal Code with respect to temporary employees, adding a new Section 4.04.145 to implement state employment policies, a new Section 4.20.055 to provide premium pay for temporary employees, and a new Section 4.34.100 to provide for their vacation pay; and repealing Sections 4.04.125 and 4.34.070.
